channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by GAD3 for La Vanguardia, 12–14 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Popular (EPP): 21.3–26.6%
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 19.7–24.8%
  • Unidos Podemos (GUE/NGL): 14.5–19.1%
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía (ALDE): 24.6–30.1%
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya (Greens/EFA): 2.0–4.1%
  • Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català (ALDE): 1.0–2.6%
  • Euzko Alderdi Jeltzalea/Partido Nacionalista Vasco (ALDE): 0.8–2.3%
  • Euskal Herria Bildu (GUE/NGL): 0.3–1.3%
  • Coalición Canaria (ALDE): 0.1–0.9%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Simple Lógica, 1–7 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Popular (EPP): 17.7–22.5%
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 18.7–23.5%
  • Unidos Podemos (GUE/NGL): 15.1–19.7%
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía (ALDE): 26.9–32.4%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Celeste-Tel for eldiario.es, 1–7 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Popular (EPP): 24.1–29.3%

  • Coalición Canaria (ALDE): 0.1–0.8%
  • Bloque Nacionalista Galego (Greens/EFA): 0.0–0.7%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Metroscopia for El País, 2–5 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 26 February–2 March 2018 – Voting Intentions

item.title: Opinion Poll by IMOP for El Confidencial, 22–27 February 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Partido Popular (EPP): 12–15 seats
  • Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 12–15 seats
  • Unidos Podemos (GUE/NGL): 9–12 seats
  • Ciudadanos–Partido de la Ciudadanía (ALDE): 16–19 seats
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Euzko Alderdi Jeltzalea/Partido Nacionalista Vasco (ALDE): 0–1 seats
  • Partido Animalista Contra el Maltrato Animal (—): 0–1 seats
  • Euskal Herria Bildu (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
